@Delta would you be willing to comment on the removal of @omgAdamSaleh from his flight for @MIA_YEG , a Canadian anti-racism initiative?
@JoshUkrainian @MIA_YEG is all about promoting honest dialogue about racism/bigotry & other injustices without assuming :) #MakeItAwkward
@JoshUkrainian regardless of opinion, I would still like to engage with @omgAdamSaleh & hear his side of the story along with any witnesses'
@JoshUkrainian although his "pranks" have been tasteless in the past, it doesn't negate the fact that his human rights were violated
@omgAdamSaleh let me know if you'd be willing to chat with me about your encounter. Stay strong, you have our support. #MakeItAwkward
@omgAdamSaleh hey Adam. I'm the social Media Director for @MIA_YEG (a Canadian anti racism initiative). Wanted to reach out in solidarity â¤

@jdrewix so the @CityofEdmonton commercial that was in the process of being filmed? That's what was shot before and after.
It IS raw and unedited... @thelipscombe please connect with @jdrewix ASAP :) https://t.co/1WMDV6IfB9
@gavinugh if you're interested in a meaningful & civil interaction about social justice, let me know. Until then, carry on with your life.
@gavinugh maybe don't continue to argue for the sake of arguing after I've agreed to disagree?
@gavinugh stated A MILLION TIMES that you're entitled to your own opinion - by "progress", I mean moving forward in the discussion.
I want a hug from @21savage
Thank you so much lil grem. ðŸ™ðŸ½ Trust me, I'm mid-headache also. https://t.co/bROt2A1HPS

@TehBhav Go through all of my twitter interactions today if you want to aggressively facepalm yourself repeatedly
@gavinugh again, I feel like I've repeated myself a million times. We are not progressing, though I have tried.
@gavinugh it's not. But the non white westerners are still substantially more oppressed than the white ones and that also can't be denied
@gavinugh however, said principles are still derived from white colonialism & inherently racist/oppressive values that = detrimental to POCs
@gavinugh in your opinion*. In mine, it derives from systematic principles of oppression that exist in EVERY culture. Ex- eastern shadeism
@gavinugh your redundancy is underwhelming and yes, now I'm being condescending. PLZ leave this alone, you're backing yourself into a corner
@gavinugh we are going around in circles. I have already addressed all of this. See my previous tweets. Goodnight
@EyeRaaah I just honestly can't ðŸ™„ðŸ™ˆ
@gavinugh When you ran out of arguments, you made false assumptions, claimed condescension and attacked me with immature profanity
@gavinugh absolutely not. You had the opportunity to speak freely and you did. I disagreed with most of your statements and challenged them
@gavinugh is your race not a factual component of your identity? I stated what your race was - there was no attack on it.
@gavinugh for the millionth time, I never said you deny it's existence. I apologized for the assumption and NEVER ATTACKED YOU
@gavinugh the point of it is to STIMULATE conversation. In order to abolish racism, we must ADDRESS ITS EXISTENCE- It's working right?
@gavinugh you had every opportunity to represent yourself so it's at the reader's discretion. Let's leave it to them.
@gavinugh you did the exact same thing to me - it was assumption after assumption. How are we even still arguing?!
I appreciate that. We can agree to disagree and I hope that you and @thelipscombe can converse about this again. :) https://t.co/pAF1POPzFO
@jdrewix we can skype and you're welcome to record or post the session?
@gavinugh to each their own. Again, my tweet asked that people NOT attack you but rather read our interaction - the public can weigh in.
@jdrewix anyways - I tried to have a civil convo with you about this. No need to attack my statements-we could talk in person if you prefer?
@jdrewix that wasn't weak or hasty. That's me standing in my truth-for you to throw around even a hypothetical false rape situation is wrong
@jdrewix also - I am a sexual assault survivor so maybe be wary when promoting victim mentality.
@jdrewix again, you believe it was staged. If it was, it would be AWFUL. Luckily that's not what we do. #MakeItAwkward
Twitter is really killing me today ðŸ™„
@jdrewix bring your problem to the @thelipscombe personally - don't knock our cause.
@jdrewix we are very familiar with the terms and have a license if that's what you mean. https://t.co/NNn3gl6icK
@jdrewix manufactured story by an anonymous face - it's been looked into. TheDirty is obviously not a credible source LOL
@jdrewix there is no corporate entity - and all profits go towards various charitable causes like the Centre for Race & Culture
@jdrewix to each their own but I'll personally testify that this wasn't staged. I encourage you to find a better platform for anti-racism!
@jdrewix the entire initiative is privately funded by him -have you looked into how much $ or awareness we've raised for causes w 0 profit?
@jdrewix I'm the social Media Director for #MakeItAwkward and I wouldn't be involved with a cause that didn't serve a selfless purpose!
@jdrewix unsure if his existence centres around marketing it when he is busy with film/music/fitness in addition to #MakeItAwkward ...?
@jdrewix what's wrong with using your network to bring attention to a very important cause following an incident of oppression?
@jdrewix since long before the incident which has brought much-needed attention to racism/bigotry. Still unsure what sources your skepticism
@jdrewix I've had very similar encounters happen to me and Jesse has actually been a well-known staple in the arts/fitness scene in #YEG
@gavinugh but you put this on a public forum where any of your keywords could've been searched and discovered. It was no attempt to "expose"
@jdrewix interesting... what makes you say that?
Definitely! But drawing awareness to it to prevent future hate crimes once he's in custody is also important, rightâ€¦ https://t.co/aZhJljDc8L
@gavinugh now you're being petty & immature so this is where I make my exit. Every1 can read this interaction & formulate their own opinion
@gavinugh lol all you had to say was "I am involved". Reading back, you HAVE been extremely condescending. It's subjective after all.
@gavinugh anyways, I hope you have a good day. Off I go to work. Followers - what are your thoughts? NO ATTACKS on @gavinugh PLZ.
@gavinugh and I stand firmly behind the way in which I do it. If you feel the same way, get involved with a local initiative and speak up.
@gavinugh i have. I've been a social justice advocate for 10 years. I stand behind my mission to draw awareness to racism. #MakeItAwkward
@gavinugh acknowledge that you have to read?! Sorry, that deserves no medal. When it comes to oppression, i have no desire to be concise
